name: Make it! Ikayaki
description:
Make ikayaki (grilled squid) on the Steam!
Fire up your hot plate and cook a bunch of ikayaki!
You can play with up to four players!
A new high score is just within your reach!


Cook ikayaki on your hot plate!
Earn points based on how well your ikayaki are cooked!
Make as many as you can before time runs out!


1. Cook the surface a little, then make a cut!

2. Cook the other side a little, then put the skewer in!

3. Once the surface has cooked well, cover it in sauce!

4. Once the other side has cooked too, pack it up and you're done!

[Score Attack]
Make lots of ikayaki to increase your score and climb the rankings!

[Battle]
Test your ikayaki-making skills in a cooking competition!
